__e: So, what's the new spot to take a date these days?
It's the type of hotel where you bring ladies who aren't your wife.
You have the people who bear the load.
My parents, they died bringing us to this country.
I'll make a call, and they'll come and take you to a home.
My business brings me back to this city more often than I'd like.
I still don't get why you agreed to host this thing... and why they don't bring their own clothes.
Don't other dads take their kids to the driving range?
Sheesh, it's like bring your kid to work day.
Well, in times of need, you go where the money takes you.
Um, this is something I always do for parents who bring in documents.
They're fucking around with us, taking our jobs...
Now they take my baby boy.
First, he's there when they remove the body. Then, he just happens to drop in here.
Just when you think you have something, it's taken away.
If they take me away from him, can I come and stay with you?
If they take them away, it's best if you go with them.
They're dropping her off in two hours.
Why won't your parents take you home, Ben?
To their home... They don't bring me to their home.
Nobody seems to know anything about your past and the only evidence I got points right at you.
I know. I just hate being taken to parties where i don't know anyone, and i didn't want you to feel that way. You know?
The evidence points to it all being done by one man.
Take your work home with you. You're never off the job.
I mean, look... everyone brings their work home with them sometimes.
